statement.p: An 20 ft extension ladder is 144 in long before extending. If each rung is 14 in above the previous, and the ladder is leaned at an angle of \displaystyle{75}^{\circ}, how much higher is the top of the ladder if it is extended 7 rungs?
Round down to the nearest inch.

solution.p: We need to calculate how high the ladder reaches before extending and how high it reaches after extending.
